#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<limits.h>
#define ll long long
//#define INT_MAX 1000003
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,j,a,b;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> a >> b;
        int ans[105][105]={0};
        int data[105][105];
        for(i=1;i<=a;i++)
        {
            for(j=1;j<=b;j++)
                cin >>data[i][j];
        }

        ans[1][1]=1;
        for(i=1;i<=a;i++)
        {
            for(j=1;j<=b;j++)
            {
                if(i==1 && j==1)
                continue;

                if(data[i][j]>data[i-1][j] && ans[i-1][j]!=0)
                ans[i][j]=max(ans[i][j],ans[i-1][j]+1);
                if(data[i][j]>data[i][j-1] && ans[i][j-1]!=0)
                ans[i][j]=max(ans[i][j],ans[i][j-1]+1);
            }
        }
        int var=0;
        for(i=1;i<=a;i++)
        {
            for(j=1;j<=b;j++)
                var=max(var,ans[i][j]);
        }
        cout << var << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
